scripts.init: npm install && typings install && cp d.ts/leaflet.d.ts typings/globals/leaflet/index.d.ts && mkdir lib && cp -Rf ts/d.ts lib/
scripts.clean: rm -Rf coverage browser-test/bundle.js lib typings node_modules
scripts.reinit: npm run clean; npm run init
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run transpile && istanbul cover _mocha -- -- test/*.js
scripts.browser-test: npm run transpile; browserify test/index.js -o browser-test/bundle.js
scripts.build-examples: npm run transpile && cd examples && tsc; browserify tile-layer-directive/index.js -o tile-layer-directive/bundle.js && browserify map-component/index.js -o map-component/bundle.js && browserify zoom-control-directive/index.js -o zoom-control-directive/bundle.js
scripts.dependency-check: npm outdated && (node-dependencies || echo "There are outdated sub-dependencies!")
